methods.addChunk:
Append a chunk of data to this column source.

 The chunk must not be empty (i.e., the size must be greater than zero).

:param chunk: (io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.WritableChunk<? extendsio.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.Attributes.Values>) - the chunk of data to add
methods.clear:
Reset the column source to be ready for reuse.
 
 Clear will discard the currently held chunks.  This should not be called if a table will continue to reference
 the column source; as it violates the immutability contract.
methods.getSize:
Get the size of this column source (one more than the last valid index).

:return: (long) the size of this column source
methods.make:
Create a new ChunkColumnSource for the given chunk type and data type.

*Overload 1*  
  :param chunkType: (io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.ChunkType) - the type of chunk
  :param dataType: (java.lang.Class<?>) - the datatype for the newly created column source
  :return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunkcolumnsource.ChunkColumnSource<?>) an empty ChunkColumnSource
  
*Overload 2*  
  :param chunkType: (io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.ChunkType) - the type of chunk
  :param dataType: (java.lang.Class<?>) - the datatype for the newly created column source
  :param componentType: (java.lang.Class<?>) - the component type for the newly created column source (only applies to Objects)
  :return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunkcolumnsource.ChunkColumnSource<?>) an empty ChunkColumnSource
  
*Overload 3*  
  :param chunkType: (io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.ChunkType) - the type of chunk
  :param dataType: (java.lang.Class<?>) - the datatype for the newly created column source
  :param sharedOffsetForData: (gnu.trove.list.array.TLongArrayList) - an array list representing the shared offsets for data across several ChunkColumnSources
  :return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunkcolumnsource.ChunkColumnSource<?>) an empty ChunkColumnSource
  
*Overload 4*  
  :param chunkType: (io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.ChunkType) - the type of chunk
  :param dataType: (java.lang.Class<?>) - the datatype for the newly created column source
  :param componentType: (java.lang.Class<?>) - the component type for the newly created column source (only applies to Objects)
  :param sharedOffsetForData: (gnu.trove.list.array.TLongArrayList) - an array list representing the shared offsets for data across several ChunkColumnSources
  :return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunkcolumnsource.ChunkColumnSource<?>) an empty ChunkColumnSource

text:
An immutable ColumnSource that is backed by chunks.
 
 The owner of the column source may append chunks to with the addChunk call.
